ABOUT US

With the great talent we house, we believe we have adequate experience to handle your next huge project. Doing what we do with love is what drives us, without this, there is no us.

Reliable

Whats better than satisfying services? We understand that, thats why we make it our obligation to give you satisfying services. We don't just beat deadlines, but we also deliver the quality deserved.

Creative

We are not just about code. We help you think 10X, not just 10%. We put our imagination to work along with our experience to ensure we deliver a solution, nut just a product.

This is who we are

Imarishwa Solutions is a software solutions provider for the corporate ecosystem. Since inception, we have provided solutions ranging from web application development to company branding and IT consultancies for clients across the corporate space in Kenya. Our approach is based on making it our business to understand our clients' business processes, working hand in hand with them in implementing proposed sustainable, cost effective, maintainable and scalable solutions adressing the loop holes.
Imarishwa is committed to improving the profitability of our customers through the use of leading-edge online technologies, delivered by knowledgeable and service-oriented Consultants. As more businesses realize the importance of the Internet to their continued success and growth, Imarishwa is ready to serve their needs with real e-business solutions.

SERVICES

Passion Drives us in What We DO!

  • Software Development
  • Payments Integration
  • Branding & Design

Let's build that solution together,

Our main focus is building custom software applications on any scale, from small consultations, to robust projects. Our approach is based on building applications with focus of appropriate technology, great quality, maintainability, reduce time to market, and security.

Receive your Payments, anywhere...

Simplify your online payment processing integrating with the MPESA, Airtel and Equitel Payment. We also integrate international payment gate ways, paypal, mastercard, visa etc.

Re-discover your brand

There is more to design than just colors and shapes. Being unique is not just a matter of being different but having that magic no one else has. Working with us on your new outlook will give you the touch of elegance you deserve.
